channel.title: crashlytics on My learning and diary
channel.description: Recent content in crashlytics on My learning and diary

item.title: Unable to upload Crashlytics dSYM file during build phase of a flutter project due to script error
item.description: Recently I added Crashlytics into my project on Oct 25, 2022. I encountered this issue and spent a while to fix it. Today I had to figure out how to do it again, and spent a while. I hated to do that again, so here is this article. The key message is the first one below. It is quite misleading and lead me to wrong direction to change DEBUG_INFORMATION_FORMAT.
